name: Assemble The Words
description:
In this game, there will be alphabets (A-Z) that will display on the screen. Players will have to swipe the correct alphabet one by one in order to make the correct word which will display on the screen. Apart from matching the word, there will be few alphabets that will be missing from the word, players will have to find the missing alphabet, from the alphabets displayed on the screen.

This game has different categories like Food, Fruits, Body Parts, Birds, Sports, Animals, Color, Transportation, Flowers, etc.
